Preterit.turoyo: 1) maḥšamle l-u=paša w daməx 137; prs 118/29; hawilalyomaḥšammeʕamḥḏoḏemaḥšamle, bəṯṯərmə-ḥšəmtosaləq l-i=goro, daməxʕal i=goro
translations: ‘After he had dinner he went up on the roof and retired to bed’; 41/12 [MT]

Infectum.turoyo: 1) šaġole k-əzzehən l-u=šuġlaṯṯe w k-oṯənʕaṣriyemaḥəšmigabayye w k-əzzehən 144; 77/228; 2) u=laly-awo k-maḥšam-me 6/88;

Imperativ.turoyo: 1) aḥšḗm w lo=zayʕat 151; prs 14/32; toxumaḥšemuaʕman MM 149;
